course.subject: CSC
course.title: Graduate Research or Internship Practicum
course.catalogDescription: This course offers graduate students in Cybersecurity an opportunity to integrate theory with practice. Students work full-time or part-time for a company in a position related to their graduate research or work with faculty on a research project. Anticipated learning objectives are established in a contract agreed to by the student, the company supervisor (if applicable), and the faculty sponsor / research mentor. Students will be required to develop a report upon completion of the class of publishable quality demonstrating what they've learned through the experience or must submit a co-authored manuscript to a reputable conference or journal. May be repeated for credit.

objectives.objective: To be determined in individual student's contract

outline.topic: To be determined in individual student's contract
